descriptionHTML:
Needle watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Needle Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Needle Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ Battery level
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month

How to use Needle Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Needle watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Needle Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: Clean and attractive I like the refined look and am using it as my daily watch face. I have it 4 stars because the phone (pixle xl) battery reading stays at 100 all day. Edit - booted phone and phone battery function works as developer's quick response explained. Edit - I have to reboot phone each day for phone battery to connect. To bad this doesn't work. Nice face.
Phone batt power is incorrect frequently due to app error.
